data.name: One Week With You
data.detailed_description:
◆History.
We are in war, but in this hard times I can find a peaceful place with you.
Now I must take care of you, I must understand what's going on.

◆Game.
Short Visual Novel with more that 10.000 words.
4 Sex scene CG full animation.
A adult love history with magic and fantasy like always.
With beatiful illustrations and animations at each sex scene. With great audios.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WINDOWS® 7 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3 Series or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 500 Series or AMD Radeon™ HD6000 Series (VRAM 1GB) or better

content_descriptors.notes:
This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, General Mature Content.
It have nudes and sex scenes.
